item.title: How to make npc say somthing?
item.dc:creator: @moopoo82 moopoo82
item.description:
@moopoo82 wrote:

theres 100’s of guides in the server section.
I could post some code to show you a vent command.
you type ::vent (text here) and all of the npcs say when ever you type.
but i guess you just want them saying pure store above their heads or do you want it with the blue click here thing down the bottom?
here


                    if (npcs[i].npcType == ##) {
                        if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "";
                        }
                    }

Then replace the ## with the NPC # (NPC.CFG)
Then between the “” put the text you want the NPC to say
That simply makes npcs speak.

Read full topic
